vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PERSONAL_BANK.collect (patch_0.sol#31-37):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_0.sol#33-36)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_0.sol#34)
